blogPost.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
blogPost.body: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
blogPost.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果

previous.excerpt: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
previous.title: CALIPIO Screen Recorder - Free and secure screen recorder

localize.description: 记录你的屏幕和网络摄像头。无需安装。受端到端加密保护。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免费使用。
localize.tagline: 免费和安全的屏幕记录器

localize.description: 記錄你的屏幕和網絡攝像頭。無需安裝。受端到端加密保護。可在Windows、Mac、Linux、iOS、Android上免費使用。
localize.tagline: 免費和安全的屏幕記錄器

next.excerpt: Social Image Generator is a WordPress plugin that automatically creates social share images for your content, increasing your social engagement and saving you hours of tedious work.
next.title: Social Image Generator - Automatically generate social images for your WordPress site

localize.description: 社交图片生成器是一个WordPress插件，它可以自动为你的内容创建社交分享图片，增加你的社交参与度，并节省你繁琐的工作时间。
localize.tagline: 为您的WordPress网站自动生成社交图片

localize.description: 社交圖片生成器是一個WordPress插件，它可以自動爲你的內容創建社交分享圖片，增加你的社交參與度，並節省你繁瑣的工作時間。
localize.tagline: 爲您的WordPress網站自動生成社交圖片
